chapters.title: Prologue: Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Juilaine Madome, p. 50 (45)—Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah, recently raised to a Sitter for the Brown in Tar Valon. She was hand-picked for her spot in the Hall, and not in the usual way the Browns pick. She is tall, attractive, and has short black hair.
